artist: Engraver: Guiseppe Zocchi; Painter: After Pietro da Cortona (Pietro Berrettini)
description: Hercules seated on a rock in a landscape holding a club; two figures standing at his left gesturing toward temple upper right; printed in brown
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in brown:[Pietro Cortona inv et del.  Gius. Zocci sc./ The JUDGEMENT of HERCULES/ After an Original Drawing of Pietro ds Cortona]; on sheet in pencil: [100 done/1-310]
title: The Judgement of Hercules
